english.segment1: I hear them chanting again. I hear them crying out loud. I see the masses fall away. This bitter war has begun. I hear the children cry for food. Their fathers have left them all for dead
english.segment2: Chorus: And we're running out of time. We're running out of time. Getting closer to the edge. We're running out of time
english.segment3: There's a fountain filled with blood. Poured from the virus of unborn children. The masacre is endless. And we watch them fade away
english.segment4: I hear the screaming save the trees. But we'd kill a generation to suit our own needs. What are we ending up to be. A nation in bondage that thinks we are free
